meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with long, thin edible roots.
meanings.sent1: The salsify grew tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I harvested some fresh salsify for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The salsify plant told the carrots a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed like salsify in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The salsify roots resembled delicate white fingers in the soil.

meanings.definition: The root of the salsify plant, used as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I cooked the salsify with butter and herbs.
meanings.sent2: The salsify root had a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the salsify root go to school? To get a little more grounded!
meanings.sent4: The salsify root was a hidden gem in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The chef transformed the salsify into a gourmet dish.
